demolition

Class EnemyRed

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.GameObject
      • demolition.Player
        • demolition.EnemyRed

  • public class EnemyRed
extends Player
    The Red Enemy that can move in random position after collided the solid or broken wall

      • EnemyRed

        public EnemyRed(int x,
                int y,
                int matrixX,
                int matrixY,
                Wall[][] map)
        Constructor for Red Enemy inherited from Player
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the Red Enemy
        y - y-coordinate of the Red Enemy
        matrixX - the grid position x of the Red Enemy, it indicates which row the Red Enemy is in
        matrixY - the grid position y of the Red Enemy, it indicates which column the Red Enemy is in
        map - the 2-D array that store all the wall object and its child
        See Also:
        Player(int, int, int, int, demolition.Wall[][]), GameObject, Wall
